page.title: 17HAVEN HOLIDAY CAMP
page.content: Haven Holidays is a holiday camp at the junction of the Helston _ Lizard road and the road which leads into Mullion village.The area is still known as "the Red Triangle"; as it was known by before it was redeveloped 3 years ago by its present owners. It has 300 static caravans and 50 chalets, a field with 140 pitches for touring caravans and an overflow field for another 30. The static caravans are modern, and accommodate up to 7 people.There is a supermarket and several launderetttes, with automatic washing machines, drying and ironinng facilities. There are facilities deigned to attract families: heated swimming pool,a pub and club,a restaurant,a takeaway food shop,an amusement arcade,a games room,tennis courts. It provides a number of holiday jobs for Mullion School pupils
